summary: I COULD BARELY STOP THE CAR. I WAS IN THE MOUNTAINS AND THERE WAS NO FORD DEALER IN THAT TOWN. I TOOK IT TO A LOCAL SHOP AND THEY SAID I SHOULD NOT DRIVE OVER A MOUNTAIN PASS. THERE WAS A RECALL FOR THE BRAKE BOOSTER. I HAD IT FIXED AND NOW FORD IS REFUSING TO PAY ME BACK. THEY STATE IT IS NOT A SAFETY RECALL.
